Package ch.hsr.bieridee.android.adapters

Class Summary
ActionListAdapter The ActionListAdapter adapts the JSON action structure to the Android ListView.
BeerListAdapter The BeerListAdapter adapts the JSON beer structure to the Android ListView.
BeertypeListAdapter The BeerListAdapter adapts the JSON beer structure to the Android ListView.
BreweryListAdapter The BreweryListAdapter adapts the JSON brewery structure to the Android ListView.
BrewerySizeSpinnerAdapter The BrewerySpinnerAdapter adapts the JSON brewerySize structure to the Android ListView.
ContinousScrollJsonAdapter Adapter for data in JSONArrays, and continous scrolling.
CreateBeerSpinnerAdapter The CreateBeerSpinnerAdapter adapts the JSON bewery and beertype structure to the Android Spinner.
JsonListAdapter The BreweryListAdapter adapts the JSON brewery structure to the Android ListView.
RecommendationsListAdapter The BeerListAdapter adapts the JSON beer structure to the Android ListView.
